DOC.brief_summary: An open label, three way crossover study to determine the effect of a high fat breakfast or a low fat breakfast on the pharmacokinetics of a single dose of regorafenib.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Food (High Fat and Low Fat Breakfast) on the Pharmacokinetics of Regorafenib
